dct_description_sm: Map of Mauritania showing towns, villages, roads, rivers, and other features in the region of Tidjikja.
Bar scale on map given in "km."
Dressé par le Sérvice Géographique de l'A.O.F. à Dakar en 1923. Revu en 1927. Dessiné, héliogravé et imprimé par le Service Geographique de l'Armée en 1928. Compèlté en 1933.
dct_publisher_sm: Service Geographique de l'Armée - 136 bis Rue de Grenelle
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Property rights reside with the repository. Copyright (c) Stanford University. All Rights Reserved.
